ED_Title: Confirmation of the appointment of the Secretary-General of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
ED_DecisionText: At its 88th plenary meeting, on 25 August 2025, the General Assembly confirmed the appointment by the Secretary-General of Rebeca Grynspan as Secretary-General of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development for a further two-year term of office, beginning on 12 September 2025 and ending on 11 September 2027. (Footnote: See A/79/996.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/79/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
